outputs.output_descr: This project (2012-2014) intends to provide technical and advisory assistance in supporting the Ministry of Economy and Planning to formulate the forthcoming Tenth National Development Plan (10thNDP; 2015-19) and sustain the necessary national capacities for both the formulation and follow-up processes. While the Ninth National Development Plan (9thNDP; 2010-14) has been making significant progress in building the physical capacity of public infrastructure and social services to an extent that full coverage in most of these services is expected to be achieved before the end of the NDP period, The need to consolidate these achievements through: (1) Effectiveness of Services Delivery and Quality Enhanced, and (2) Efficiency of Services of Key Sectors Promoted; (3) The Financial Sustainability of Services Ensured. The assistance is targeted to the social and economic sectors that directly impact Human Development as delineated by the Millennium Development Goals (MDG) and their associated indicators. Primarily, The Education & Training Sectors, The Health Sector, The Transportation Sector, The Manpower Sector, The Municipal Services Sector, and the Domestic Trade Sector.

project_descr: Mainstreaming HDI across Seven Key National Sectors

subnational.name: Minsitry of Economy and Planning, Riyadh
